title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.13 - Accrued liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.13 - Accrued liability

State Regulations

An amount of interest, wages, or other expense recognized
or incurred on and before a given date but not paid; sometimes referred to as
accrued expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
